text: (nabiye!) ovunge at soya gat (napuru) kriyavan hetuven ovunta ek amarukamak æti vu avasthavedi (eyata pratikarayak soya gata nohæki vu ovunge pahat tatvaya) kese tibunedæyi (yanna oba avadhanaya kara balanu). pasuva ovun oba vetama pæmina “(api ovun veta giye) hondak ha ekamutukamak balaporottuven misa, vena kisivak api adahas karamin nova” yayi allahge namayen divrannaha
